CustomField.description: EPH-5727 BOB MGMT - Seller BOB Object - Fields US-0007597: Do NOT set Active__c flag for LTTM managed Seller to TRUE
CustomField.formula: if(ISPICKVAL( BoB__r.Status__c , 'BoB Active'), if(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Removed'), false , true ) , false )
CustomField.label: Active
